brief_summary.textblock:
Controlled trial of an intervention to reduce indoor exposures to cockroach allergens among
      asthmatic children in NYC.

clinical_study.brief_title: Reducing Indoor Allergen Exposures in Northern Manhattan and the South Bronx

criteria.textblock:
Ages 6-18

        Doctor-diagnosed asthma

        Skin-test reactivity to cockroach antigen

        Daily cockroach sitings in home

facility.name: Mailman School of Public Health at Columbia University

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (NIEHS)

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
